   viśvatvaṃ śṛṇu me viṣṇor haritvaṃ ca kṛte yuge /	viSva tvam SRNu me vizNoH hari tvam ca kRte yuge /
   vaikuṇṭhatvaṃ ca deveṣu kṛṣṇatvaṃ mānuṣeṣu ca // HV_32.1 //	vEkuNWa tvam ca devezu kRzNa tvam mAnuzezu ca // HV_32.1 //

   saṃpratyatītāṃ bhāvyāṃ ca śṛṇu rājan yathātatham // HV_32.2 //	saMprati atItAm BAvyAm ca SRNu rAjan yaTAtaTam // HV_32.2 //

   brahmā śakraś ca somaś ca dharmaḥ śukro bṛhaspatiḥ // HV_32.4 //	brahmA SakraH ca somaH ca DarmaH SukraH bRhaspatiH // HV_32.4 //
   aditer api putratvam etya yādavanandanaḥ /	aditeH api putra tvam etya yAdava nandanaH /

   prasādajaṃ hy asya vibhor adityāṃ putrajanma tat /	prasAda jam hi asya viBoH adityAm putra janma tat /

   adhiśrayaṇavelāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ gṛhamedhinām /	aDiSrayaNa velAyAm prAptAyAm gRhameDinAm /

   upāvṛttāsu vai goṣu duhyamānāsu ca vraje /	upAvRttAsu vE gozu duhyamAnAsu ca vraje /

   agnīṣomātmake saṃdhau vartamāne jaganmaye // HV_68.11 //	agnIzoma Atmake saMDO vartamAne jagat maye // HV_68.11 //
   paścimenāgninā dīpte pūrveṇottaravarcasā /	paScimena agninA dIpte pUrveNa uttara varcasA /
   dagdhādrisadṛśe vyomni kiṃcit tārāgaṇākule // HV_68.12 //	dagDa adri sadRSe vyomni kiMcid tArA gaNa Akule // HV_68.12 //
   vayobhir vāsaśubhatām bandhubhiś ca samāgamam /	vayoBiH vAsa SuBa tAm banDuBiH ca samAgamam /
